column1: How often do you clean your keyboard?
column2: How often do you use a public keyboard?
column3: When you clean your keyboard, how long does it take?
column4: Is it pleasant or demanding to clean and sanitize your keyboard?
column5: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being you care a lot), how much do you care for a clean and sanitized keyboard?
column6: After seeing this statistic, on a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being you care a lot), how much do you care to have the public keyboards that you use cleaned and sanitized?
column7: What other products have you bought for keyboard cleaning? Answer 'None' if you have never bought keyboard specific cleaning products.
column8: What features would you like to see in an autonomous keyboard cleaner?
column9: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being very comfortable), how comfortable are you with a robot being used in your office space/library/lab?
column10: For cleaning, do you prefer if a human or a robot does it?
column11: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being the best), how satisfied are you with the cleaning and sanitizing job?
column12: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being the best), how satisfied are you with how fast the robot comes?
column13: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being very easy), how easy was it to call the robot from the web app?
column14: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being the best), how satisfied are you with the user interface of the web app?
column15: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being the best), how satisfied are you with the functionality of the web app?
column16: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being the best), how satisfied are you with the user interface of the admin dashboard?
column17: On a scale of 1 to 5 (5 being the best), how informative is the admin dashboard?
column18: What visual data would you want present in the admin dashboard?
column19: After observing the web app and robot integration, do you have any comments or suggestions for the product?
